title: Economic and Financial Crimes (Division of Court) Order, 2022
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 9
Gazette date 14th January, 2022
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 5 of 2022
The High Court Act
(Laws, Volume 3, Cap. 27)
The Economic and Financial Crimes (Division of Court)
Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 3 of the High
Court Act, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Economic and Financial Title
Crimes (Division of Court) Order, 2022.
2. There is established the Economic and Financial Crimes Economic
Court as a division of the Court. and Financial
Crimes Court
3. The Economic and Financial Crimes Court shall, in addition Jurisdiction
to the jurisdiction of the Court under Article 134 of the Constitution, of Economic
and
hear and determine matters relating to economic and financial crimes,
Financial
and corruption. Crimes
Court
Cap. 1
4. The Economic and Financial Crimes Court shall consist of a Composition
Judge or such numbers of Judges of the Court as may be determined of
Economic
by the Chief Justice. and
Financial
Crimes
Court
DR M. MALILA,
LUSAKA Chief Justice
7th January, 2022
[CJ/6/1/4]
`
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
10 Statutory Instruments 14th January, 2022
